title: Daikatana Playthrough -- Part 3
description: Finished! So, yes, John Romero made me his bitch. I actually enjoyed this game. There were some shitty parts of course, I got lost a bunch but that's normal to all old FPS's. The Daikatana itself was pretty stupid, the story was fucking awful and the fact that they tried to make the story important is embarrassing, the end boss was the worst I've ever seen. But the game was fun overall for me and I think it's a game worth playing with the most recent patch. I'm very interested in the speedrun also, because this game has very fast movement and tons of opportunities for boosting.
